channel.title: Tech on 2D Steve
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on 2D Steve

item.title: Touch Me
item.description: Okay, before you freak out over the title of this post, I’m talking about computers with touch surfaces.

item.title: Reading With My Ears
item.description: I don’t know about you guys, but in this culture where we have less and less time to do anything, one of the things I miss the most is having time to sit down and read a book.
